alert.note: Alert for Missoula, Bitterroot Valleys (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 16 at 2:24PM MST until January 18 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations between 3 to 7 inches in the Missoula Valley, with 1 to 4 inches in the Bitterroot. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Bitterroot Valley and Missoula. * WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday evening and Thursday morning commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Any wet surfaces will freeze quickly Wednesday evening into Thursday morning.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
